250500.name: General: Vandalism
250500.description: Select a <u>Combat</u> or <u>Elite</u> domain to immediately get the rewards of the domain and change it to a <u>Blank</u> domain (The effects of Curios do not activate simultaneously)

250501.name: Domain: Oblivion
250501.description: Select an <u>Occurrence</u>, <u>Occurrence: Abnormal</u>, or <u>Reward</u> Domain. Obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Blessing(s) for every Occurrence in the domain, and turn it into <u>Blank</u> Domain

250502.name: Domain: Emotion
250502.description: After the current movement, immediately turn all adjacent domains to the right of the current domain (excluding <u>Boss</u> and <u>Blank</u>) into <u>Blank</u> Domains. For each domain changed, gain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments and <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> random Blessing(s)

250503.name: General: Imitation
250503.description: Select 1 domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>) and turn it into <u>Combat</u> Domain

250504.name: Domain: Creation
250504.description: Immediately turn a random domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>) into <u>Occurrence</u> Domain or <u>Occurrence: Abnormal</u> Domain

250505.name: Domain: Self
250505.description: Select 1 domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>). Immediately copy the current domain onto the selected domain and apply the <u>Knowledge</u> effect

250506.name: General: Counteract
250506.description: Select 1 domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>). Immediately copy the selected domain onto an adjacent domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>) and apply the <u>Knowledge</u> effect

250507.name: Domain: Intuition
250507.description: Select 1 domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>) and randomly reshuffle all domains of that type in the current plane, with each reshuffle granting <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments

250508.name: General: Perception
250508.description: Select 1 domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>) and turn <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random adjacent domain(s) into the same type as the selected domain

250509.name: General: Inspiration
250509.description: Select 1 domain, copy the selected domain to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random location(s) on the current plane, and apply <u>Knowledge</u> to it (excluding <u>Boss</u>)

250510.name: Domain: Classification
250510.description: Select 1 <u>Combat</u> Domain (excluding <u>Boss</u>) and turn <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random adjacent domain(s) into <u>Combat</u> Domain

250511.name: General: Confirmation
250511.description: Immediately turn 1 random <u>Elite</u> Domain or <u>Adventure</u> Domain into a Reward Domain

250512.name: Domain: Association
250512.description: Select 1 <u>Combat</u> or <u>Elite</u> Domain and switch it with a random domain adjacent to the current domain

250513.name: Beacon: Imagination
250513.description: Select 1 <u>Combat</u>, <u>Elite</u>, <u>Occurrence</u>, <u>Occurrence: Abnormal</u>, or <u>Reward</u> Domain and apply a random beacon to it. Then, switch it with a random domain adjacent to the current domain

250515.name: Domain: Experience
250515.description: Select 1 <u>Combat</u> domain with beacon. Immediately obtain the reward in the domain and change it into <u>Blank</u> Domain (The effects of Curios do not activate simultaneously)

250516.name: General: Dialectics
250516.description: Immediately copy the current domain to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random location(s) on the current plane and apply <u>Knowledge</u> to it (excluding <u>Boss</u>)

250517.name: General: Duel
250517.description: For every 1 domain on the current plane that contains a <u>Blessing Trotter</u> or <u>Curio Trotter</u> beacon, immediately gain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments. These domains then all swap their positions with a random adjacent domain.

250518.name: Beacon: Abstraction
250518.description: Immediately generates <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random beacon(s) on the current plane

250521.name: General: Sensibility
250521.description: Immediately generates <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> <u>Blessing Trotter</u> or <u>Curio Trotter</u> beacon(s) in random <u>Combat</u> or <u>Elite</u> domain(s)

250522.name: Knowledge: Evidence
250522.description: Immediately generates <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random beacon(s) in random domain(s) with <u>Knowledge</u>

250523.name: General: Deduction
250523.description: Immediately applies <u>Knowledge</u> to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random domain(s) that don't yet have <u>Knowledge</u> on this plane

250524.name: General: Diffusion
250524.description: Immediately generates <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random beacon(s) in random domain(s) on this plane (This effect will not be generated again after taking effect for 1 time on this plane)

250525.name: Knowledge: Principle
250525.description: Immediately applies <u>Knowledge</u> to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> domain(s) adjacent to each domain with <u>Knowledge</u> on this plane

250526.name: Knowledge: Reflection
250526.description: Immediately applies <u>Knowledge</u> to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random domain(s) that don't yet have <u>Knowledge</u> on this plane

250529.name: Knowledge: Arithmetic Progression
250529.description: Select 1 domain with <u>Knowledge</u> and apply <u>Knowledge</u> to all its adjacent domains

250530.name: Knowledge: Protectiveness
250530.description: After the current movement, immediately applies <u>Knowledge</u> to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random domain(s) that are about to collapse.

250531.name: General: Arithmetic
250531.description: After the current movement, immediately applies <u>Knowledge</u> to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random domain(s) adjacent to the domain where characters are located

250532.name: General: Exponential Explosion
250532.description: After the current movement, immediately applies <u>Knowledge</u> to all domains adjacent to the domain where characters are located

250533.name: Knowledge: Pre-sale
250533.description: After the current movement, immediately applies <u>Knowledge</u> to all domains that are about to collapse

250534.name: Knowledge: Chips
250534.description: For every type of domain that has <u>Knowledge</u> on the current plane, immediately obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random Blessing(s) (A maximum of <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> random Blessings can be obtained)

250536.name: Domain: Challenge
250536.description: When entering a <u>Combat</u> or <u>Elite</u> domain during the current movement, obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Blessing(s)

250537.name: Domain: Cost
250537.description: When entering an <u>Occurrence</u>, <u>Occurrence: Abnormal</u>, or <u>Reward</u> domains during the current movement, increase the countdown by <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak>

250538.name: General: Olfactory
250538.description: During the current movement, when entering a domain of the same type as the one where characters are currently in, receive Blessings <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> times

250539.name: General: Justice
250539.description: When entering a domain with <u>Knowledge</u> during this movement, receive <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments. When entering a domain with a beacon during this movement, receive Blessings <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> times

250540.name: Knowledge: Extreme
250540.description: When entering a domain with <u>Knowledge</u> during this movement, apply <u>Knowledge</u> to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random domains on the current plane

250541.name: Beacon: Intimacy
250541.description: When entering a domain with a beacon during this movement, generate <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> <u>Blessing Trotter</u> or <u>Curio Trotter</u> beacon(s) on the current plane

250542.name: Beacon: Prey
250542.description: During this movement, can move to a domain in the closest column that contains either a <u>Blessing Trotter</u> beacon or <u>Curio Trotter</u> beacon. Rewards gained from defeating Trotters are doubled

250545.name: General: Observation
250545.description: Can move to any domain in the next 3 columns during the current movement

250546.name: Knowledge: Grandiose Fantasy
250546.description: Can move to any domain with <u>Knowledge</u> during the current movement

250547.name: Beacon: Infinity
250547.description: Can move to any domain with a beacon during the current movement

250550.name: General: Adventure Preference
250550.description: Select 1 <u>Elite</u> or <u>Reward</u> Domain and turn it into an <u>Adventure</u> Domain

250551.name: Beacon: Replacement
250551.description: Select 1 domain with a beacon and immediately swap its beacon into a different type of beacon, then receive 1 random Blessing

250552.name: Domain: Sell
250552.description: After the current movement, for every domain that collapses, immediately obtains <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragment(s)

250553.name: Beacon: Geometry
250553.description: For every type of beacon that exists on the current plane, immediately obtain 1 random Blessing (A maximum of <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random Blessings can be obtained)

250555.name: Beacon: Shuffle
250555.description: Immediately change all beacons on the current Plane into random beacons, then generate 1 random beacon

250556.name: Knowledge: Winning Hand
250556.description: Immediately turn 1 random domain with <u>Knowledge</u> into an <u>Adventure</u> Domain (excluding <u>Boss</u> Domains)

250557.name: General: Pawn Shop
250557.description: Discard Curio 1 time and obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments (This will not take effect when no Curios can be discarded)

250560.name: Heterogeneity: Biphasic
250560.description: Obtain 1 Curio and 1 random Negative Curio (This effect will not be generated again after taking effect for 1 time on this plane)

250561.name: Heterogeneity: Reforge
250561.description: Discard 1 Curio and obtain it again

250562.name: Heterogeneity: Consumerism
250562.description: Immediately turn <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> random domain(s) into <u>Transaction</u> Domain(s) (excluding <u>Boss</u>)

250563.name: Heterogeneity: Interest
250563.description: When entering <u>Transaction</u> Domain during this movement, obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments

250564.name: Heterogeneity: Alienation
250564.description: Select 1 <u>Elite</u>, <u>Adventure</u>, or <u>Reward</u> Domain and turn it into a <u>Transaction</u> Domain, then obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments

250565.name: Heterogeneity: Treasure
250565.description: For every Curio that you own, immediately obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments

250566.name: Heterogeneity: Inflation
250566.description: For the current movement, can move to a <u>Transaction</u> Domain in the closest column. The cost of items in that domain increases by <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak>, however both the Curio Store and the Blessing Store will contain 1 random free item

250567.name: General: Time Trade
250567.description: Consume 1 point of countdown or increase Disruption level by 1 to instantly get <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragment(s)

250569.name: General: Hesitation
250569.description: Obtain 1 random Negative Curio and add 1 point in the countdown (This will not take effect when no Negative Curios can be obtained)

250570.name: General: Phaseless
250570.description: Discard Curio 1 time and add <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> point(s) in the countdown (This will not take effect when no Curios can be discarded)

250571.name: General: Colorless
250571.description: Select 1 <u>Reward</u> or <u>Adventure</u> Domain, turn it into a <u>Blank</u> Domain, and gain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> point(s) in the countdown

250572.name: Knowledge: Curve
250572.description: Select 1 domain with <u>Knowledge</u> and apply <u>Knowledge</u> to <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> of its random adjacent domains

250573.name: General: Entropy
250573.description: Select 1 domain and apply <u>Knowledge</u> to it

250576.name: Knowledge: Subtraction
250576.description: Select 1 domain. Make it and all its adjacent domains lose <u>Knowledge</u>. For every <u>Knowledge</u> lost in this way, receive <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments

250577.name: General: Topology
250577.description: For every domain on the current plane that has <u>Knowledge</u>, immediately obtain <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments

250578.name: Knowledge: Transcendence
250578.description: Select 1 domain with <u>Knowledge</u>, turn it into a <u>Blank</u> Domain with <u>Knowledge</u>, and obtain Blessings 1 time (excluding <u>Blank</u> and <u>Boss</u> domains)

250579.name: General Buff: Shield
250579.description: When entering combat during the current movement, characters gain a Shield equal to <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turns. At the beginning of each turn, this Shield additionally increases by <unbreak>3[i]%</unbreak> of the affected ally's Max HP.

250580.name: General Buff: Fragility
250580.description: When entering combat this time, reduce all enemies' Effect RES by <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> and Control RES by <unbreak>2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>3[i]</unbreak> turns.

250581.name: General Buff: Detonation
250581.description: When entering combat in this movement, after a character uses Basic ATK, for every 1 turn (up to <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turns) that remains for the DoT on the attacked target, immediately deals DMG equal to <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG and removes the DoT. This effect lasts for <unbreak>3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

250582.name: General Buff: Preference
250582.description: When entering combat in this movement, every time allies restore HP, they will restore additional HP equal to <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP, lasting for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250583.name: General Buff: Dexterity
250583.description: When entering combat in this movement, increase the SPD of all allies by <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

250584.name: General Buff: Baseline
250584.description: When entering combat in this movement, allies will not receive DMG exceeding <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP in a single attack. This effect lasts for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s), and can be triggered for up to 1 time per each turn.

250585.name: General Buff: Vengeance
250585.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' follow-up attack DMG dealt ignores <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of the target's DEF, lasting for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250586.name: General Buff: Rejuvenation
250586.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Skill Point(s) allies have consumed, they recover 1 Skill Point, lasting for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250587.name: General Buff: Initiative
250587.description: When entering combat in this movement, allies casting their Ultimate will Advance their action Forward by <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak>. This effect can only be triggered once for every <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s), lasting for <unbreak>3[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250588.name: General Buff: Investment
250588.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every <unbreak>100</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments in possession, characters using attacks will deal Additional DMG equal to <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of their ATK to the attacked enemy target, lasting for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250589.name: General Buff: Martyrdom
250589.description: When entering combat in this movement, at the start of the enemy target's turn, the enemy target will consume HP equal to <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP if their current HP is <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of their Max HP or higher. This effect lasts for <unbreak>2[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250590.name: General Buff: Law
250590.description: When entering combat in this movement, for every domain that has <u>Knowledge</u> on the current plane, all enemies receive a set amount of DMG equal to <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak> of their respective Max HP, not exceeding <unbreak>2[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP

250591.name: General Buff: Pattern
250591.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' ATK increases by <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak>. For every Blessing owned, increases ATK by an additional <unbreak>2[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>3[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250592.name: General Buff: Secret Box
250592.description: When entering combat in this movement, all allies' Max HP increases by <unbreak>1[i]%</unbreak>. For every Curio owned, increases Max HP by an additional <unbreak>2[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>3[i]</unbreak> turn(s)

250594.name: General: Attention
250594.description: Immediately generates <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> <u>Double</u> or <u>Choice</u> Beacon(s) in <u>Occurrence</u>, <u>Occurrence: Abnormal</u> or <u>Reward</u> domains

250595.name: General: Erasure
250595.description: Choose a domain with any number of beacons in it and remove all beacons in it, then receive <unbreak>1[i]</unbreak> Cosmic Fragments

250596.name: Domain: Social
250596.description: You may move to the nearest <u>Elite</u> or <u>Reward</u> domain in this movement
